Text: there's an annoying banner on each of these videos taking up the top 1/8 of the screen

this is too large to take a chance on. the description is bland, and you didn't even take the time to make preview pics. i'd rather d/l from sites that have uploaders who make decent presentations for their larger uploads. the sites might keep up with your seed/leecher ratio, but i like to know what i'm downloading, especially if it's over 2 gigs.
Over two gigs is too large? What are you on dial up? Com'n, it takes maybe an hour to DL, just let it run in the background.

@Decker  
I think you're missing the point. A file this big should have at least a few screenshots. For the good of the community
